summary: This is an email forwarding a voicemail attachment from July 9, 2019. A U.S. Attorney's Office employee forwards a voicemail from a woman claiming to have information relevant to the Epstein case to FBI contacts, requesting it be added to an FBI spreadsheet and followed up on.

events.title: Voicemail from Potential Informant Received
events.description: A woman leaves a voicemail claiming to have information relevant to the Epstein case. The message is forwarded from the U.S. Attorney's Office to the FBI for logging and follow-up.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2019, a voicemail from a woman claiming to have case-relevant information was received by the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The voicemail was forwarded to FBI contacts with instructions to add it to an 'FBI spreadsheet' and conduct follow-up.
The document indicates an active process for logging and investigating tips from the public during the Epstein investigation.
